CustomField.formula:
IF ( NOT(ISBLANK(FluidImageRecipeId__c)),
IF ( AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(Category__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Category__r.FluidViewImage__c)) ), $Setup.ProductSettings__c.FluidPictureUrl__c + FluidImageRecipeId__c + '/image/' + Category__r.FluidViewImage__c + '.jpg', $Setup.ProductSettings__c.FluidPictureUrl__c + FluidImageRecipeId__c + '/image/Front.jpg' ), '' )
CustomField.label: Fluid Image 0 Url
